about_the_game:
Saddle up and get ready to ride with enough music to load a pair of six-shooters!

The Wild West Variety Pack by composer Joel Steudler will keep you on the dusty trail from the saloon to the prairie and on to the frontier where danger and duels await... and it won't even cost you a fistful of dollars.

This pack contains:
  • 12 instrumental music tracks
  • Looped music for battles, towns, and dungeons
  • Themes that evoke the feel of the wild west
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space

Recommended:
